speaker: President.
english: President. No, Mr President. There is no restriction to the time that the Presidency-in-Office of the Council and the Commission have to speak, but today we all have to share the time available, a scarce and non-renewable resource.
original: President. No, Mr President. There is no restriction to the time that the Presidency-in-Office of the Council and the Commission have to speak, but today we all have to share the time available, a scarce and non-renewable resource.
agenda_item: Preparations for the European Council: the Lisbon Strategy (debate)
